steps.name: Create Account
steps.description: Sign up for a MaiSON account to access all buyer features.
actions: Visit maisonai.co.uk and click 'Sign Up'
Complete your profile with personal details and preferences
Verify your email address
Set up notifications for new properties

steps.name: Property Search
steps.description: Find properties that match your criteria.
actions: Use the search filters to narrow down properties
Save favorite properties to your dashboard
Set up alerts for new properties matching your criteria
Use the map view to explore neighborhoods

steps.name: Virtual Viewings
steps.description: View properties remotely before deciding to visit in person.
actions: Browse 3D tours and video walkthroughs
Schedule live video viewings with the AI assistant
Ask questions about the property through the chat
Request additional information or photos

steps.name: In-Person Viewings
steps.description: Visit properties you're seriously interested in.
actions: Schedule viewings through the platform
Receive confirmation and directions
Use the MaiSON app to access property details during viewing
Submit feedback after the viewing

steps.name: Make an Offer
steps.description: Submit an offer on your chosen property.
actions: Click 'Make an Offer' on the property page
Enter your offer amount and any conditions
Upload proof of funds or mortgage in principle
Submit your offer securely through the platform

steps.name: Negotiation
steps.description: Negotiate with the seller through our AI assistant.
actions: Receive counter-offers through the platform
Discuss terms with the AI assistant
Submit revised offers if needed
Receive offer acceptance notification

steps.name: Transaction Completion
steps.description: Complete the purchase process with guided assistance.
actions: Access the Transaction Hub
Connect with recommended solicitors and surveyors
Upload required documents
Track progress to completion
Receive keys and complete purchase

benefits: Save money with no buyer fees
Transparent process with no pressure tactics

support.description: Need help at any stage of your buying journey? We're here to assist you.
support.support_availability: Our team is available during business hours, and our AI assistant is available 24/7 for immediate help.

steps.name: Create Account
steps.description: Sign up for a MaiSON account to list your property.
actions: Visit maisonai.co.uk and click 'Sign Up'
Complete your profile with personal details
Verify your email address
Select 'Sell Your Home'

steps.name: Property Listing
steps.description: Create a comprehensive listing for your property.
actions: Enter property details, features, and specifications
Upload photos or schedule professional photography
Create 3D tour or schedule our team to create one
Set your asking price with AI-assisted valuation
Review and publish your listing

steps.name: Manage Viewings
steps.description: Handle viewing requests and showcase your property.
actions: Receive and approve viewing requests
Schedule in-person viewings at convenient times
Conduct virtual viewings through the platform
Receive feedback from potential buyers

steps.name: Receive Offers
steps.description: Review and respond to offers from potential buyers.
actions: Receive offer notifications
Review offer details and buyer information
Discuss offers with the AI assistant
Accept, reject, or counter offers

steps.name: Negotiation
steps.description: Negotiate with buyers through our AI assistant.
actions: Communicate with buyers through the platform
Receive guidance on market conditions and fair pricing
Counter-offer or accept final offers
Confirm acceptance and move to transaction phase

steps.name: Transaction Completion
steps.description: Complete the sale process with guided assistance.
actions: Access the Transaction Hub
Connect with your solicitor through the platform
Upload required documents
Track progress to completion
Complete sale and transfer ownership

benefits: Save thousands in estate agent commissions (only 0.5% fee)
Control your listing and viewing schedule
Receive offers directly from serious buyers
Transparent process with no hidden fees

support.description: Need help at any stage of your selling journey? Our team is ready to assist you.
common_support_needs: Help with photography and 3D tour scheduling
Guidance on pricing your property competitively
Questions about offer negotiation and acceptance
support.support_availability: Our dedicated seller support team is available during business hours, and our AI assistant can help with many questions 24/7.
